author: James McLeod
title: Surge in health-tech innovation could be silver lining in COVID-19 crisis
description: Pandemic already spurring major changes in health care system
content: Before the COVID-19 crisis began to hit North American hospitals, Think Research chief executive Sachin Aggarwal said his health-tech company would typically push out its updated clinical protocols to clients once a month. Now those updates may come in just a… [+5669 chars]
